alert.note: Alert for Capitol Reef National Park and Vicinity; South Central Utah; Western Canyonlands (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 10:57PM MST until January 23 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...South Central Utah, Capitol Reef National Park and Vicinity and Western Canyonlands. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Occasional winter driving conditions can be expected particularly on higher passes of SR-95 between Hanksville and Bullfrog. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Capitol Reef National Park and Vicinity; South Central Utah; Western Canyonlands
